objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Exquisite Wreath Design
• Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.

- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.

- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 68 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner showcases an elegant and modern jewelry promotion. The design is built on a soft pink radial gradient background enhanced with subtle decorative elements like circular highlights and floral accents that add a feminine and delicate touch. Dominating the right side is an image of shimmering rose gold stud earrings, reinforcing the product’s luxurious appeal.

The left section features layered text elements. The `tagline` introduces the theme in bold uppercase typography. The `heading` employs a large, eye-catching font style to highlight the product name in two stacked lines. Below it, the `subheading` offers a graceful accent in a stylish serif. The `description` lists three concise product highlights in a bullet point format.

The `price` is prominently displayed with a futuristic font style for emphasis. Below it, a rounded coral-pink rectangular button (`cta_background`) includes the `cta` text encouraging users to take action.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink (#FFF6F9 to #FFE6EC gradient)
- Rose Gold (#D87093)
- Deep Brown (#6D4C41)
- Warm Mauve (#B0717C)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings in a soft, feminine color palette ideal for advertisement design. The dominant hue is a rose gold (#F4A6A6), used in the metallic floral framework. This warm tone blends harmoniously with the pale pink enamel petals (#F9C2C0), imparting sophistication and grace. Brilliant white diamonds (#FFFFFF) provide striking contrast and visual sparkle, enhancing the luxurious look. Accents of shimmering silver (#D1D1D1) in the marquise-cut stones add a cool balance. Together, these colors are artfully blended yet distinct, emphasizing the premium and delicate nature of the product—a perfect base for a luxurious, pastel-toned ad banner.
